messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

mail about registration name please forward leader thanks dear sir madam thanks reading letter letter regarding brand etc chinese registrar received registration application found main body brand same name therefore verify two companies affiliated please asap thanks cooperation best regards fax road
